00028 class btConvexPenetrationDepthSolver;

00033 class btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm : public btActivatingCollisionAlgorithm
00034 {
00035         btSimplexSolverInterface*               m_simplexSolver;
00036         btConvexPenetrationDepthSolver* m_pdSolver;
00037 
00038         
00039         bool    m_ownManifold;
00040         btPersistentManifold*   m_manifoldPtr;
00041         bool                    m_lowLevelOfDetail;
00042         
00043 public:
00044 
00045         btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm(btPersistentManifold* mf,const btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap, btSimplexSolverInterface* simplexSolver, btConvexPenetrationDepthSolver* pdSolver, int numPerturbationIterations, int minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold);
00046 
00047 
00048         virtual ~btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm();
00049 
00050         virtual void processCollision (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut);
00051 
00052         virtual btScalar calculateTimeOfImpact(btCollisionObject* body0,btCollisionObject* body1,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut);
00053 
00054         virtual void    getAllContactManifolds(btManifoldArray& manifoldArray)
00055         {
00057                 if (m_manifoldPtr && m_ownManifold)
00058                         manifoldArray.push_back(m_manifoldPtr);
00059         }
00060 
00061 
00062         void    setLowLevelOfDetail(bool useLowLevel);
00063 
00064 
00065         const btPersistentManifold*     getManifold()
00066         {
00067                 return m_manifoldPtr;
00068         }
00069 
00070         struct CreateFunc :public       btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc
00071         {
00072 
00073                 btConvexPenetrationDepthSolver*         m_pdSolver;
00074                 btSimplexSolverInterface*                       m_simplexSolver;
00075                 int m_numPerturbationIterations;
00076                 int m_minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold;
00077 
00078                 CreateFunc(btSimplexSolverInterface*                    simplexSolver, btConvexPenetrationDepthSolver* pdSolver);
00079                 
00080                 virtual ~CreateFunc();
00081 
00082                 virtual btCollisionAlgorithm* CreateCollisionAlgorithm(btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci, const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap)
00083                 {
00084                         void* mem = ci.m_dispatcher1->allocateCollisionAlgorithm(sizeof(btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm));
00085                         return new(mem) btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm(ci.m_manifold,ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap,m_simplexSolver,m_pdSolver,m_numPerturbationIterations,m_minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold);
00086                 }
00087         };
00088 
00089 
00090 };
